text:
我没想到话题又回来了：“……是。”
“和朋友？”
“啊。”
“喝高了？”
“有点……”
顾起山顿了一下：“你让我回来，让我等一晚上。 然后你在外面鬼混。”
“什么叫鬼混……”我嘴比脑快，思想慢半拍：“诶诶诶诶诶诶等会，这段掐了重来一遍。”
“……”
搞半天，我他妈原来没押对题。
我才反应过来昨晚发的那条短信。 原来考题在这。
见鬼了，顾起山这小子不会真等了我一晚上吧。
trans:
I didn't realize the topic was back, "...yes."
"With a friend?"
"Ah."
"You got drunk?"
"A little..."
Gu Qishan paused for a moment, "You asked me to come back and made me wait here all night. Then you fooled around outside."
"What do you mean by fooling around...," my mouth was faster than my brain and my thoughts were slower by half a beat, "What? Wait a minute. Stop here and let's start over again."
"..."
What the fuck, I didn't even get it right.
I just reacted to the text message I sent last night. The test is here.
Hell, did Gu Qishan really wait for me all night.
